Author: Raysfire
Description: A simplistic yet bold hud for TF2 made to cut out a lot of clutter included that of the stock hud. Comes with a range of various vivid colors associated with both low health as well as ammo to make important information easily accessible and noticeable.

UberCharge.Name: rh_color_uber_bar
UberCharge.Label: Charging
UberCharge.ToolTip: Color of the UberCharge when charging.

UberCharge.Name: rh_color_uber_full
UberCharge.Label: Charged Solid
UberCharge.ToolTip: Color of the UberCharge when full.

UberCharge.Name: rh_color_uber_flash1
UberCharge.Label: Charged Flash 1
UberCharge.ToolTip: Color of the UberCharge when flash style is enabled.

UberCharge.Name: rh_color_uber_flash2
UberCharge.Label: Charged Flash 2
UberCharge.ToolTip: Color of the UberCharge when flash style is enabled.

UberCharge.Name: rh_val_uber_animation
UberCharge.Label: Uber Style
UberCharge.ToolTip: Change the style of UberCharge's color scheme.

Crosshair.Name: rh_color_xhair_pulse
Crosshair.Label: Hitmarker Color
Crosshair.ToolTip: Color of crosshair when hitting another player.

Health.Name: rh_color_health_normal
Health.Label: Health Normal
Health.ToolTip: Color of player health when normal.

Health.Name: rh_color_health_buff
Health.Label: Health Buffed
Health.ToolTip: Color of player health when buffed.

Health.Name: rh_color_health_low
Health.Label: Health Low
Health.ToolTip: Color of player health when low.

Health.Name: rh_val_health_style
Health.Label: Health Style
Health.ToolTip: Change to different health styles options.

Ammo.Name: rh_color_ammo_clip
Ammo.Label: Clip Normal
Ammo.ToolTip: Color of the ammo clip when normal.

Ammo.Name: rh_color_ammo_clip_low
Ammo.Label: Clip Low
Ammo.ToolTip: Color of the ammo clip when low.

Ammo.Name: rh_color_ammo_reserve
Ammo.Label: Reserve Normal
Ammo.ToolTip: Color of the ammo reserve when normal.

Ammo.Name: rh_color_ammo_reserve_low
Ammo.Label: Reserve Low
Ammo.ToolTip: Color of the ammo reserve when low.

Options.Name: rh_toggle_classic_menu
Options.Label: Classic Main Menu Style
Options.ToolTip: Toggle to the classic main menu style.

Options.Name: rh_toggle_min_scoreboard
Options.Label: Minimal Scoreboard
Options.ToolTip: Toggle to a minimal scoreboard style.

Options.Name: rh_toggle_menu_image
Options.Label: Main Menu Class Images
Options.ToolTip: Toggle the character images seen on the main menu.

Options.Name: rh_toggle_damage_pos
Options.Label: Damage Above Health
Options.ToolTip: Toggle position of the damage dealt value to be over player health.

Options.Name: rh_toggle_chat_bottom
Options.Label: Chatbox On The Bottom
Options.ToolTip: Toggle position of the game chat to be near the bottom.

Options.Name: rh_toggle_center_class
Options.Label: Centered Class Select
Options.ToolTip: Toggle style of the class select to be center-oriented.

Options.Name: rh_toggle_center_class
Options.Label: Centered Team Select
Options.ToolTip: Toggle style of the team select to be center-oriented.

Options.Name: rh_toggle_metal_pos
Options.Label: Centered Metal Counter
Options.ToolTip: Toggle the position of the Engineer's metal counter to be near the middle.

Options.Name: rh_toggle_alt_player_model
Options.Label: Alternate Player Model
Options.ToolTip: Toggle the position of the player's mini 3D model to be on the left.

Options.Name: rh_toggle_disguise_image
Options.Label: Spy Disguise Image
Options.ToolTip: Toggle the spy silhouette seen when changing the disguise.

Options.Name: rh_toggle_streamer_mode
Options.Label: Streamer Mode
Options.ToolTip: Removes player and game details, useful when streaming.

Options.Name: rh_toggle_mode_selection
Options.Label: Alt. Mode Selection
Options.ToolTip: Toggles to an alternate variant of the Mode Selection panel

Options.Name: rh_val_killfeed_rows
Options.Label: Killfeed Rows
Options.ToolTip: Change the number of rows seen on the killfeed.

Options.Name: rh_val_main_menu_bg
Options.Label: Menu Background
Options.ToolTip: Change the style of background image shown on the main menu.

Options.Name: rh_val_health_style
Options.Label: Health Style
Options.ToolTip: Change the style of the player health.

Options.Name: rh_custom_background
Options.Label: Set Custom Background
Options.ToolTip: Replace the main menu background with a custom image.
